verses.text: Afterward he \w brought|strong="H3212"\w* me to the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \add even\add* the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* that \w looketh|strong="H6437"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*:

And, behold, the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*: and his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \add was\add* like a \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*: and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w shined|strong="H0215"\w* with his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

And \add it was\add* according to the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of the \w vision|strong="H4758"\w* which I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, \add even\add* according to the \w vision|strong="H4758"\w* that I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* when I \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: and the \w visions|strong="H4759"\w* \add were\add* like the \w vision|strong="H4758"\w* that I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* by the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w Chebar|strong="H3529"\w*; and I \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 43.3 \ft when…: or, when I came to prophesy that the city should be destroyed\f*

And the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* whose \w prospect|strong="H6440"\w* \add is\add* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*.

So the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* took me \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me into the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*; and, behold, the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add him\add* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* unto me out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by \w me|strong="H0681"\w*.

¶ And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of my \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, and the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the \w soles|strong="H3709"\w* of my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, where I will \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, and my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, shall the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* no more \w defile|strong="H2930"\w*, \add neither\add* they, nor their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, by their \w whoredom|strong="H2184"\w*, nor by the \w carcases|strong="H6297"\w* of their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* in their high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.

In their \w setting|strong="H5414"\w* of their \w threshold|strong="H5592"\w* by my \w thresholds|strong="H5592"\w*, and their \w post|strong="H4201"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* my \w posts|strong="H4201"\w*, and the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* between me and them, they have even \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* by their \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* that they have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*: wherefore I have \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* them in mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*.\f + \fr 43.8 \ft and the…: or, for there was but a wall between me and them\f*

Now let them put \w away|strong="H7368"\w* their \w whoredom|strong="H2184"\w*, and the \w carcases|strong="H6297"\w* of their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me, and I will \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of them for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

¶ Thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they may be \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w* of their \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*: and let them \w measure|strong="H4058"\w* the \w pattern|strong="H8508"\w*.\f + \fr 43.10 \ft pattern: or, sum, or, number\f*

And if they be \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w* of all that they have \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w shew|strong="H3045"\w* them the \w form|strong="H6699"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w fashion|strong="H8498"\w* thereof, and the goings \w out|strong="H4161"\w* thereof, and the \w comings|strong="H4126"\w* in thereof, and all the \w forms|strong="H6699"\w* thereof, and all the \w ordinances|strong="H2708"\w* thereof, and all the \w forms|strong="H6699"\w* thereof, and all the \w laws|strong="H8451"\w* thereof: and \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \add it\add* in their \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, that they may \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the whole \w form|strong="H6699"\w* thereof, and all the \w ordinances|strong="H2708"\w* thereof, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them.

This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; Upon the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* the whole \w limit|strong="H1366"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \add shall be\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*. Behold, this \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ And these \add are\add* the \w measures|strong="H4060"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* after the \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: The \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* \add is\add* a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and an hand \w breadth|strong="H2948"\w*; even the \w bottom|strong="H2436"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* thereof by the \w edge|strong="H8193"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \add shall be\add* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w span|strong="H2239"\w*: and this \add shall be\add* the higher \w place|strong="H1354"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.\f + \fr 43.13 \ft bottom: Heb. bosom\f*\f + \fr 43.13 \ft edge: Heb. lip\f*

And from the \w bottom|strong="H2436"\w* \add upon\add* the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* \add even\add* to the \w lower|strong="H8481"\w* \w settle|strong="H5835"\w* \add shall be\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w*; and from the \w lesser|strong="H6996"\w* \w settle|strong="H5835"\w* \add even\add* to the \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w settle|strong="H5835"\w* \add shall be\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \add one\add* \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w*.

So the \w altar|strong="H0741"\w* \add shall be\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; and from the \w altar|strong="H0741"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* \add shall be\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w*.\f + \fr 43.15 \ft the altar shall: Heb. Harel, that is, the mountain of God\f*\f + \fr 43.15 \ft the altar and: Heb. Ariel, that is, the lion of God\f*

And the \w altar|strong="H0741"\w* \add shall be\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \add cubits\add* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*, \w square|strong="H7251"\w* in the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w squares|strong="H7253"\w* thereof.

And the \w settle|strong="H5835"\w* \add shall be\add* \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \add cubits\add* \w long|strong="H0753"\w* and \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w* in the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w squares|strong="H7253"\w* thereof; and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* it \add shall be\add* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w*; and the \w bottom|strong="H2436"\w* thereof \add shall be\add* a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*; and his \w stairs|strong="H4609"\w* shall \w look|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*.

¶ And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; These \add are\add* the \w ordinances|strong="H2708"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when they shall \w make|strong="H6213"\w* it, to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* thereon, and to \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereon.

And thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that be of the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*, which \w approach|strong="H7138"\w* unto me, to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, a \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* on the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of it, and on the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H6438"\w* of the \w settle|strong="H5835"\w*, and upon the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: thus shalt thou \w cleanse|strong="H2398"\w* and \w purge|strong="H3722"\w* it.

Thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* also of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and he shall \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* it in the appointed \w place|strong="H4662"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*.

And on the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; and they shall \w cleanse|strong="H2398"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, as they did \w cleanse|strong="H2398"\w* \add it\add* with the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*.

When thou hast made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w cleansing|strong="H2398"\w* \add it\add*, thou shalt \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, and a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* out of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*.

And thou shalt \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* upon them, and they shall offer them \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \add for\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

\w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* every \w day|strong="H3117"\w* a \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*: they shall also \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* a \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* out of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*.

\w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall they \w purge|strong="H3722"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* and \w purify|strong="H2891"\w* it; and they shall consecrate \w themselves|strong="H4390"\w*.\f + \fr 43.26 \ft consecrate…: Heb. fill their hands\f*

And when these \w days|strong="H3117"\w* are \w expired|strong="H3615"\w*, it shall be, \add that\add* upon the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \add so\add* \w forward|strong="H1973"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w make|strong="H6213"\w* your burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and your peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*; and I will \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 43.27 \ft peace…: or, thank offerings\f*
